title: What is the difference between GLoan and GLoan Sakto
content:

Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [How do I pay for my GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675961653913-How-do-I-pay-for-my-GLoan-Sakto) - [Am I qualified for GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361-Am-I-qualified-for-GLoan-Sakto) - [What is the difference between GLoan and GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675860785177-What-is-the-difference-between-GLoan-and-GLoan-Sakto) - [What is GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21435929589657-What-is-GLoan-Sakto) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) GLoan offers a higher loan amount and longer payment terms while GLoan Sakto offers a quick loan solution with minimal fees. Here’s a quick comparison between these two products: | | | | | --- | --- | --- | | | **GLoan** | **GLoan Sakto** | | **Product Overview** | Get instant cash | | **How to Access** | via Borrow > GLoan | | **Loan Amount** | PHP 1,000 - PHP 125, 000 | PHP 100 - PHP 300 | | **Payment Terms** | Monthly payment: 
1, 5, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 24 mos | 14 days
_(_ one-time payment only, payable after 14 days _)_ | | **Interest Rate** | 1.59% - 6.99% per month
\*depending on your eligibility and selected payment term | 0% | | **Processing Fee** | 3% | Php 6.5 to Php 19.5 | | **Re-availment** | Can apply instantly after full payment of outstanding loan | | **Penalty Fees** | 1% of your loan amount for every missed due date + 0.15% of outstanding balance \* number of days past due date | **Note:** Pay your dues on time to avoid any penalty fees. ### **Need more Help?** For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles: - [What is GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/21435929589657) - [Am I eligible for GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361) - [How do I pay for my GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675961653913) [Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361-Am-I-qualified-for-GLoan-Sakto) Am I qualified for GLoan Sakto?
